H0.text: Mass is the property that matter has, defined as anything that takes up space and has mass.

H1.text: Texture is a characteristic that matter, defined as anything that takes up space, possesses.

H2.text: Odor is the property that matter possesses when matter is defined as anything that takes up space and has odor.

H3.text: Color is the property that matter, defined as anything that takes up space, has.

A4.text: mass is not a substance but a well-defined, extensive property of matter and other substances or systems.
